resources.string: Swipe on screen to change color
Carefully wipe the screen of phone or a pad a soft rag, or a napkin from dirt, dust, spots of fat and other pollution.
Simply swipe left or right to go to the next color or previous color.

On every color you watch closely a screen monochromaticism in all points. By normal operation on all flowers all pixels of the screen shall be one color. If color of pixel differs on any color, this pixel beaten means.
Simply swipe left or right to move to the next or previous color.\n Or click on the settings button to change the search mode(click here for info)
Click here to show information about the new feature, or swipe to start the pixel checker
Click on the button below to send a localization request in your desired language

By activating the automatic mode the app will scroll through the test colours, to activate it click on the button at the bottom, choose the scrolling speed, return to this screen and swipe to the right to start.

By activating the fix mode we will manipulate the screen to try to restore the broken pixels, we recommend at least 10 minutes or even better several hours of using this mode.
Warning, do not look at the screen during this mode.
Battery consumption may increase, it is recommended to have the battery at 100% or connected to the charger
To interrupt this function close app or press the back button
